taskbody.context: Follow these steps to add multiple Windows devices with the zenbatchload command.

step.cmd: Log in to the master host .
Create a text file with content similar to the following example.

stepxmp.codeblock: /Devices/Server/Microsoft/Windows FQDN-or-IP-address zWinRMUser="Administrator", zWinRMPassword="Password" FQDN-or-IP-address zWinRMUser="Administrator", zWinRMPassword="Password" FQDN-or-IP-address zWinRMUser="Administrator", zWinRMPassword="Password"
stepxmp.p: Replace FQDN-or-IP-address with the fully-qualified domain name or IP address of the Windows host to add, and replace Password with the Administrator's password for each host.

step.cmd: Load the devices into . Replace Filename with the name of the file created in the preceding step.
